body:
Hi Mostapha,

I'm having some issues like Wim (Ladybug is working but i'm getting error ( Runtime error (Win32Exception): WindowsError
Traceback:
line 540, in __init__, "<string>"
line 6715, in script )), but error appeared at lines 540 and 6715. Also Ladybug default folder displayed as C:\Users\%Username%\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug but Ladybug folder's direction is C:\Users\ I installed Radiance with falsecolor and evalglare as instructed in here
[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/I...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/Installation_Instructions.txt)

Have any suggestions?
